## Processing a Seurat object
Run the standard processing steps in a single command
```{r eval=TRUE}
pbmc_fixed <-
    process_seurat(SeuratObject::pbmc_small,
                   run_umap_dims = 1:10,
                   resolution = 0.8)
DimPlot(pbmc_fixed)
```
